attributes.action: make the buying and giving of clothing as presents illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who needs socks for Xmas? What child in their right mind wants new shoes for their birthday? Why do people think that giving clothes as presents is a good thing?

Let's face facts; when a child opens his/her presents on Xmas day, they want the parcels to contain toys, games, sweets etc. The same goes for grownups, only the toys are bigger.

So, Mr Brown (or whoever is in No. 10 by the time I've submitted this) - it's time we made giving clothes as presents a criminal act.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
